text: Marius Swart (194117 January 2021) was a South African politician and businessman. He was a member of the Democratic Alliance. He was Executive Mayor of the George Local Municipality from 2000 to 2004. He was a member of the National Assembly from 2004 to 2014. Swart was born in Swellendam, South Africa. On 8 January 2021, Swart was hospitalized in George with COVID-19 in critical condition. He died from the virus on 17 January, aged 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Afrikaner people Category:South African MPs Category:South African businesspeople Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in South Africa
title: Marius Swart
